OrgName.entry: LANGSETT ADVICE AND AREA RESOURCE CENTRE (LAARC)

Desc.entry: Offers advice in the following areas: benefits, employment, housing, consumer, tax, debt, child support, relationship breakdown, etc. Home visits subject to limited resources. Helps with benefit reviews and represents at Appeal Tribunals. Premises also used for community work support and community transport contact. Has a second base at ZEST (see separate entry). Runs outreach sessions at St John's Vicarage and NU (Netherthorpe and Upperthorpe) Base (see separate entries). Also runs a free legal information session weekly, at Creswick Street (see separate entry). Self or any referral.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Tues 9.30am-12.30pm, Wed & Thurs 1.30-4.30pm (general advice drop-in sessions), Wed 6.30-8pm (free legal advice)
